text: Nabila Jamshed is a humanitarian, public speaker, and the author of the fantasy novel Wish Upon A Time - The Legendary Scimitar. She has delivered 7 TEDx talks, and currently works with the United Nations. ==Bibliography== * ==Footnotes== ==External links== * Blog profile * Official Website Category:Indian women novelists Category:Living people Category:Writers of young adult literature Category:University of Delhi alumni Category:21st- century Indian women writers Category:21st-century Indian novelists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nabila Jamshed
